mean_cn: adj. 惹人反感的，招人嫉妒的，令人厌恶的，诽谤的，不公平的
mean_en: unpleasant and likely to cause bad feelings in other people
sentence: I will not sit here all day listening to you to hurl invidious accusations at each other!
sentence_trans: 我不会整天坐在这里听你们互相抛出诽谤的指责。
word_etyma: in不 ＋ vid看 ＋ ious形容词后缀 → 看上去不公平的 → invidious不公平的；引起反感的
